detail_desc: Halterneck bralette in soft lace with lined, lightly padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide light support. No fasteners.

Blouse in an airy weave with a small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar and a V-shaped opening with concealed buttons at the front. Gathered yoke at the back, gathers on the shoulders, long sleeves with narrow, frill-trimmed, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short, fitted dress in jersey crêpe with a sewn-in wrapover at the top and bottom. V-neck, short puff sleeves with concealed elastication, a seam at the waist and a draped skirt with an asymmetric hem. Lined.
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Short 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and raw-edge hem.
Short imitation suede skirt with a high paper bag waist.
Plastic hair claws. Width 3.5 cm.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back.
Blouse in a linen and cotton weave with a collar, V-neck opening at the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed zip in one side, side pockets with metal decorations and slim legs with decorative seams front and back.

Short-sleeved shirt in soft, washed cotton twill with a turn-down collar and a small embroidery detail on the chest. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and a yoke with a loop at the back.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a double-layered turtle neck and long sleeves.

Short, double-breasted trenchcoat in a sturdy cotton weave with a collar with a hook-and-eye fastening and loose yoke with a button front and back. Side pockets, two inner pockets with a button, a tie belt at the waist and a single back vent. Lined.
Calf-length dress in viscose crêpe with a V-neck. Short sleeves with a small opening and ties at the hems, buttons down the front and two slits at the hem. Unlined.
Satin mules with a striped foot strap with a decorative bow. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6.5 cm.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with an elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet side pockets and elasticated hems.
5-pocket knee-length shorts in washed stretch denim with worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Slim fit.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist. Ties and decorative metal rings at the sides.
Short shorts in sturdy jersey with a sheen. High waist with a wide waistband, and flatlock seams down the legs.
Short, flared skirt in plumeti chiffon with a jersey lining. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif, round neckline and gently rounded hem.

Suit trousers in a stretch cotton weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Wide jumper in a cool, fine-knit viscose blend with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, long, narrow sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in pleated jersey with a slight sheen. Pleated, stand-up collar, V-shaped opening at the front with ties at the top, and pleated flutter sleeves. Unlined.

Padded jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a reflective finish. Lined hood with an elastic drawstring, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a zipped inner pocket. Elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, buttons down the front, short puff sleeves with smocked trims and a seam at the waist. Unlined.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Wide, airy dress in a softly draping weave made from recycled polyester. Stand-up collar with a fold-down edge, concealed buttons down the front and pin-tucks at the top. Extra-long sleeves with detachable buttoned cuffs, a seam at the hips and a wide, voluminous skirt. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved top in soft, lightweight wool jersey with press-studs on the shoulders and a gently rounded hem.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication at the waist and side pockets.
Leggings in stretch jersey with a denim look. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim and a ribbed stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a chin guard at the top. Handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Pile lining at the top and a quilted lining at the bottom.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with reflective details and a detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, flap patch pockets with a press-stud, and elasticated cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Lined.
Straight-cut dress in printed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Knee-length skirt with decorative buttons down the front and a concealed zip at the back.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with adjustable straps and a zip in one side. Chest pocket, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with raw-edge hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, contrasting colour trims and a high cut at the back.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a round neck. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide, gently tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Trousers in a stretch weave with a slight sheen. Zip fly and a tab with press-studs, zipped front pockets, a fake welt back pocket and tapered legs.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Straight-style cardigan in a fine-knit viscose blend with low dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves with a lace section.

Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Shortie briefs in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a low, elasticated waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and full coverage at the back.
Wide waist belt in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with a square buckle. Width 5.5 cm.
Jumper knitted in a soft mohair blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Washed denim shirt that ties at the hem. Collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and cap sleeves with embroidery.
Sandals in cotton canvas with an adjustable hook and loop tab over the foot. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Cotton jersey vest tops with ribbing around the neckline and armholes.

Shirt in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave in a relaxed fit. Collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Imitation leather flip-flops with a decorative knot at the front. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.

Calf-length dress in a sturdy weave with a collar, button placket and flap chest pockets. Low dropped shoulders, wide, tapered sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a detachable tie belt, and slits in the sides.
Short T-shirt in soft jersey with a trim in a contrasting colour at the neckline and sleeves.

Slightly boxy-style top in patterned sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined swimsuit in fast-drying functional fabric. Narrow cut at the top with a zip at the front and mesh details at the sides.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a reversible-sequin motif on the front (normal sequins in size 1½-4Y), and a rounded hem.
Jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a round neckline, 3/4-length balloon sleeves with pleats at the shoulders and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide, long-sleeved jumper in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Satin top in a relaxed fit with a lace section at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Straight-cut, sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and pleat at the front, tie belt at the waist and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
LIMITED EDITION. Waist belt in a sturdy viscose weave with partially loose beaded decorations. Elasticated ends with concealed press-studs.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit. Regular waist, button fly, slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Unlined.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button. The skirt is made partly from recycled cotton.
Lightweight nylon jacket with an embroidered motif on the chest, drawstring hood and zip down the front. Welt side pockets and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Court shoes with pointed toes and covered heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) soles. Heel 8 cm.

Long, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with pleats at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with a short gathered frill and decorative narrow ties at the sides, and a gathered, draped skirt. Lined.
Fitted top in soft jersey with a slightly lower neckline and long sleeves.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey. Short sleeves with striped, ribbed trims.
Pointelle-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in woven fabric. Regular waist with a hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, fake back pockets and wide legs with creases.
